# noro

> For AI agents: Documentation is bundled at `node_modules/noro/docs/`. Search with grep or read files directly.

One-time secret sharing CLI for env vars.

## Overview

noro encrypts secrets client-side and creates self-destructing links. The server never sees your data.

## Documentation

- [Install](./install.md): Installation and quickstart
- [Share](./share.md): Create one-time secret links
- [Claim](./claim.md): Retrieve and save shared secrets
- [Push](./push.md): Share entire .env files
- [Manage](./manage.md): List and revoke secrets

## Quick Reference

```bash
# share a secret
noro share API_KEY

# share multiple
noro share API_KEY DB_URL --ttl=1h

# share entire .env
noro push

# claim a secret
noro abc123#key

# list active secrets
noro list

# revoke a secret
noro revoke abc123
```

## Security

- AES-256-GCM encryption
- Key stays in URL fragment (never sent to server)
- Secrets deleted after viewing
- Zero-knowledge architecture
